thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com
thread.title: Lynch Family
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Lynch Family

author: Lynch Family
title: Lynch Family
text: On 02/19/2017 I went to confirm my 11:30 am reservation and Brittany handled setting up my storage needs. She was super nice, very professional and very helpful. I wanted to take the time to let you know about your FIVE STAR employee. I just wanted to say that she is an asset to your company and deserves to be recognized for her superior customer service skills. Thank you Brittany!
